factionKeyword: adeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartes
lore: As Tigurius charges into battle, he assails the enemy with a tempest of psychic fury. Blasts of energy leap from his staff, hurling foes through the air and burning their souls to ash. It is the Chief Librarian’s acute foresight that is most valuable to his Chapter – his merest intuition is worth more than the predictions of an army of strategists and spies.

rangedWeapons.name: Storm of the Emperor’s Wrath - witchfire
Storm of the Emperor’s Wrath - focused witchfire

otherAbilities.name: Hood of Hellfire:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds .

otherAbilities.name: Master of Prescience (Psychic):
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll . In addition, once per battle round

otherAbilities.name: , you can target that unit with one of the following Stratagems for OCP:
otherAbilities.description: Counter-offensive ; Fire Overwatch ; Go to Ground ; Heroic Intervention
